data.title: De Lisle College
data.meta_description: At De Lisle, every opportunity is given to all students and staff to develop their talents and faith so that they can be the best that they can be and know they are loved by Christ.
data.text:
Welcome

I would like to extend a warm welcome to you from the wonderfully vibrant learning community of De Lisle College, a Catholic school which serves the communities of north Leicestershire.

At De Lisle, every opportunity is given to all students and staff to develop their talents and faith so that they can be the best that they can be and know they are loved by Christ. De Lisle College is a place where students encounter the love of Christ every day and through the curriculum they encounter ‘the best that has been thought and said.’ De Lisle College is a place of discipleship where every achievement is celebrated, and all students learn how to serve others. De Lisle College is a place where students have the opportunity to put their faith into action.
